name: Deepwood Memories
title: Knowledge of the Vine: Deepwood Memories
desc: "For all those who follow nature must pass through the maze of the forest and reach that endless plain."
inPlayDescription: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro Die. (Once per Round)<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro.

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro Die. (Once per Round)<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro.(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
